wikipedia_page.main: Zackariah Jozef Kotwica (born 12 January 1996) is an English footballer who plays for Southern League Premier Division South side Swindon Supermarine, where he plays as a forward.

response: Dale came through the youth system at Cheltenham Town. In February 2013 he was loaned out to Southern League side Bishop's Cleeve alongside teammate Zack Kotwica. He made his League Two debut for Cheltenham Town on 17 August 2013, coming on for Byron Harrison 82 minutes into a 3–1 defeat to at Whaddon Road. In August 2013 he joined Bishop's Cleeve once again for a second loan spell. At the end of the season Dale signed one-year contract with Cheltenham Town.
